comment: "Race Traitor of the Week Award" goes to Sen. Elizabeth Warren. She has released result of her DNA examination, revealing that she has approx. one-percent American Indian DNA. That's the heritage she identifies with: the % non-White, not the % White. This is more than just a lack of White pride, it is racial self-loathing.

            :ARG0-of (r3 / reveal-01
                  :ARG1 (h2 / have-03

                              :name (n6 / name

                              :mod (c / country

                              :quant (a2 / approximately

                                          :value 1))))))
      :snt3 (h3 / heritage
            :ARG2-of (ii / identify-01

            :ARG1 (c2 / contrast-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / percentage

                              :polarity -))
                  :ARG2 (p4 / percentage
                        :ARG1-of (w2 / white-02))))
      :domain (t / this)
      :snt4 c2
      :ARG1 (l / lack-01
